name: Save Restricted Content Bot by Safe_repo
description: Save Restricted Content Bot by Safe_repo

MONGO_DB.description: Get a mongodb url from https://cloud.mongodb.com. Change following value from yours if you dont have mongodb you are risking the account hack ...

OWNER_ID.description: The user id of user whom you would like to add as OWNER.

DEFAULT_SESSION.description: Enter Pyrogram V2 session string (it is optional and only required when you dont want to force user to login in bot) ...

LOG_GROUP.description: Enter Log Channel/Group ID (-100) and make bot admin there
